dialogue.text: I am the question asking itself. I am the mystery celebrating its own existence. I am what I am, and that's enough.

psychological_notes: Scene 400 marks complete psychological integration. Evan has become the question rather than having it. Mystery is now celebrated rather than feared. The declaration 'that's enough' shows total acceptance of uncertainty as sufficient. Full circle from desperate seeking to peaceful being.
philosophical_underpinning: Consciousness investigating itself through individual existence
therapeutic_direction: Complete integration - no longer seeking but being
